content: not one to cackle or scare young children broomhilda the witch would prefer to give you a treat broomhilda sits about 6 tall her legs are longer than most of my patterns though so she d stand taller if she could stand that is made from scraps of red heart acrylic yarns and stuffed with regular old polyfil she s a breeze to whip up if you already know how to crochet in the round
